title: Golfer Shawn Stefani Played In His Underwear At The Honda Classic - Thrillist
text: Faced with a difficult shot in the water during the Honda Classic yesterday, golfer Shawn Stefani did what any honorable professional would do: strip down to his skivvies to play the ball out of danger and avoid a one-stroke penalty. When you need to save every shot to make it to the weekend ... #QuickHits pic.twitter.com/Qb5hpmt4IE — PGA TOUR (@PGATOUR) February 24, 2017 Not since the days of Happy Gilmore has a golfer rejected the game’s formalized culture with such force. Just look at those tighty-whities. And that backswing. Stefani chopped at the ball with the sun cascading onto his pasty back, while his poor caddie watched over his pants. Despite his semi-nude efforts, Stefani did not make the tournament’s preliminary cut and advance to the next round. He did however, play golf in his underwear on live television, which is a feat only the brave can attest to.
